name: Confederation of Swedish Enterprise
bossPosition: International Director & Head of Brussel's office
membership: Member of BUSINESSEUROPE, link to BUSINESSEUROPE
goal: The confederation of Swedish Enterprise represents +/-60 000 Swedish companies with more than 1,6 million employees.It covers 70% of the private sector in Sweden.A total of 50 sector and employer associations are members of the Confederation. The Confederation strongly supports free enterprise and well-functioning market economy. The Confederation works for long-term economic growth and prosperity, through promoting entrepreneurship, competition, lower taxes and the completion of the internal market and opening up world markets.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Better Regulation, Trade, Singel Market, Mobility, Energyunion, Digital Economy, Social Pillar (Labour Mobility).
